title: I'm dependent, you're addicted

description: Episode of Series "Horizon". Takes a look at the medical facts about the five main groups of abused drugs, examining some of the popular misconceptions about drug dependence. Shows how the illegal drug problem grows out of legal drug abuse. Uses laboratory animals to show effects. Touches upon unpublished American research into cannabis.
